about_the_game:
Not enough controllers? Joystick Party is a tool that allows you to play your favorite games with your phone as a controller! You can have up to 16 of them, they are fully customizable and have close to zero latency.

With this tool, you can emulate controller inputs from your phone, and they will be recognized by your games. It will create a web page hosted locally that will allow you to connect from your phone to your computer without installing any other piece of software. You only need a Wi-Fi connection and an internet browser.

Features

  • Different layouts and themes, customizable per-controller.
  • Layout editor, to customize your buttons and joysticks.
  • Steam Workshop, to download different layouts or upload yours.
  • Choose between using generic controllers (vJoy) or regular Xbox ones, depending on your needs.
  • Change your default settings so that everyone playing starts with your pre-selected layout and theme.

Compatibility

Joystick Party can be used with any controller compatible game, for example:

  • Unravel Two
  • Duck Game
  • Gang Beasts
  • Overcooked
  • Stick Fight: The Game
  • Ultimate Chicken Horse
  • Battleblock Theater
  • Brawlhalla

We'll listen to every suggestion on how to improve it!
